entry.title: 6"x11" | Cotton Balls Arch Cake Topper, Cake Decoration Supplies - Pink/White
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4200
Type: Decorations
Price: 2.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cupcake Topper Set

Set Includes:

Cotton Balls Arch + 2 Satin Bows + 1 Glitter Paper Star
Cotton Balls Color: Pink | White
Style: Arch design cake topper
Total Size: 11.25"H x 6"W
Arch Opening Range: 3"-7"

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • This adorable cotton balloon garland cake bunting topper will set all your festive bakes off beautifully
  • Multiuse, Non-toxic and eco-friendly
  • Arch design cake topper are stylish and unique
  • Arch that is created can be altered due to bendable wire
  • Great accessory for cupcakes, cakes, ice cream, meat, cheese and any dish you want to dress up.

entry.title: 30 Pack - 3 Ply White Cotton Face Mask, Washable Fabric Face Masks With Soft Ear Loops
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Medical Supplies
Price: 12.99 - 935.28 (2 variants)

[About]

1 Qty: 30 Fabric Masks
Material: Mask- Cotton
Inner Filter: Meltdown Cloth
Color: White
Mask Size: 7"L x 5"W
Thickness: 180 GSM
Ear Loop Size: 2.5"
Ear Loop Size (Stretched): 4"
Elastic Soft Ear-loops
Higher Protection with 3-Layered Cotton Mask
Premium Quality: Ultra Solf, Comfortable, Breathable and Skin-friendly
Washable, Reusable, and can be folded for easy carry.
Masks don't have filter pockets
Stitched together with Serged-Style Hemming
Not Intended For Medical Use
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
All Sales Final. No Returns or Exchanges Allowed

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • 1 Qty: 30 Fabric Masks
  • Material: Mask- Cotton
  • Inner Filter : Meltdown Cloth
  • Color: White
  • Mask Size: 7"L x 5"W
  • Thickness: 180 GSM
  • Ear Loop Size: 2.5"
  • Ear Loop Size (Stretched): 4"
  • Elastic Soft Ear-loops
  • Higher Protection with 3-Layered Cotton Mask
  • Premium Quality: Ultra Solf, Comfortable, Breathable and Skin-friendly
  • Washable, Reusable, and can be folded for easy carry.
  • Masks don't have filter pockets
  • Stitched together with Serged-Style Hemming
  • Not Intended For Medical Use
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

  • All Sales Final. No Returns or Exchanges Allowed

Product Features :

  • This Fabric Face Mask effectively prevents dust, fine particles and pollen from the air from entering your nose and mouth.
  • Made of 100% soft cotton to keep your face soft and comfortable
  • The cloth face mask is washable, reusable, and can be folded for easy carrying
  • Ear strap is soft and elastic, strong tensile strength, suitable for most face types. Easy to wear and take off.
  • This anti-dust mask is ideal for both women and men, suitable for outdoor activity like: shopping, cycling, running, traveling, climbing and daily use.
  • No deformation, one mask can be reused for multiple times.
  • Hand Wash or Machine Cold Wash w/Mild Detergent inside Mesh Bag, Tumble Dry Low/Hang to Dry to avoid shrinkage.
  • Masks don't have filter pockets. No adjustable nose clip.

NOTE:

  • Do Not Share Face Masks
  • We do not accept any returns / exchanges / refund on this product.
